name: CVE-2019-1389
description: A remote code execution vulnerability exists when Windows Hyper-V on a host server fails to properly validate input from an authenticated user on a guest operating system, aka 'Windows Hyper-V Remote Code Execution Vulnerability'. This CVE ID is unique from CVE-2019-1397, CVE-2019-1398.
pattern: [(software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_10:-:*:*:*:*:*:x64:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_server_2012:r2:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_server_2016:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_10:1607:*:*:*:*:*:x64:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_7:-:sp1:*:*:*:*:x64:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_server_2012:-:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_server_2008:-:sp2:*:*:*:*:x64:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_10:1709:*:*:*:*:*:x64:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_8.1:-:*:*:*:*:*:x64:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_10:1803:*:*:*:*:*:x64:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:microsoft:windows_server_2016:1803:*:*:*:*:*:*:*')]
